plot: Semantic Sensor Network Ontology based Decision Support System for Forest Fire Management
summary: Fire weather indices are widely used to measure fire danger and are used to issue bushfire warnings. It can also be used to predict the demand for emergency management resources. Sensor networks have grown in popularity in data collection and processing capabilities for a variety of applications in industries such as medical, environmental monitoring, home automation etc. Semantic sensor networks can collect various climatic circumstances like wind speed, temperature, and relative humidity.
